Uses of Interface
com.continuuity.weave.api.WeavePreparer

Packages that use WeavePreparer
com.continuuity.weave.api Classes in this package provides core functionality of the Weave library. 
com.continuuity.weave.yarn Classes in this package implement the Weave API for Apache Hadoop YARN. 
 

Uses of WeavePreparer in com.continuuity.weave.api
 

Methods in com.continuuity.weave.api that return WeavePreparer
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.addLogHandler(LogHandler handler)
          Adds a LogHandler for receiving an application log.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.addSecureStore(SecureStore secureStore)
          Adds security credentials for the runtime environment to gives application access to resources.
 WeavePreparer WeaveRunner.prepare(WeaveApplication application)
          Prepares to run the given WeaveApplication as specified by the application.
 WeavePreparer WeaveRunner.prepare(WeaveRunnable runnable)
          Prepares to run the given WeaveRunnable with ResourceSpecification.BASIC resource specification.
 WeavePreparer WeaveRunner.prepare(WeaveRunnable runnable, ResourceSpecification resourceSpecification)
          Prepares to run the given WeaveRunnable with the given resource specification.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.setUser(String user)
          Deprecated. This method will be removed in future version.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withApplicationArguments(Iterable<String> args)
          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the application.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withApplicationArguments(String... args)
          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the application.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withArguments(String runnableName, Iterable<String> args)
          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the WeaveRunnable identified by the given name.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withArguments(String runnableName, String... args)
          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the WeaveRunnable identified by the given name.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withClassPaths(Iterable<String> classPaths)
          Adds the set of paths to the classpath on the target machine for all runnables.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withClassPaths(String... classPaths)
          Adds the set of paths to the classpath on the target machine for all runnables.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withDependencies(Class<?>... classes)
          Adds extra classes that the application is dependent on and is not traceable from the application itself.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withDependencies(Iterable<Class<?>> classes)
          Adds extra classes that the application is dependent on and is not traceable from the application itself.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withResources(Iterable<URI> resources)
          Adds resources that will be available through the ClassLoader of the runnables.
 WeavePreparer WeavePreparer.withResources(URI... resources)
          Adds resources that will be available through the ClassLoader of the runnables.
